title: Any way to unpatch?
body:
Hi there. 

As the title says, is there any way to go back a patch? I'm not looking to play on an older patch, I'm just trying to get my old replays. Is there any way to go about this? Or a way to get them to play without having to do patch things?

replies.body:
Sadly there isn't an implemented way of reverting a patch or watching replays from previous patches. <:(

One workaround is to make a 'highlight' of a whole replay during the patch it's recorded in. That will be saved as a .webm file instead of a .rofl file, and you can convert it into whatever medium you want for later viewing. :D
